identity.name: Mediterranean Precision
identity.description: A fusion of Swiss logistics precision and Mediterranean warmth. Trustworthy, efficient, yet human and accessible.

rules: Use relaxed leading for body text (1.6).

primary.description: Deep Azure - Represents the Mediterranean sea and trust.

secondary.description: Warm Sand - Represents the Tunisian landscape and warmth.

accent.description: Terracotta - Represents urgency, action, and rooftops.

usage: Use Primary (Deep Azure) for main actions, headers, and branding.
Use Secondary (Warm Sand) for section backgrounds to break up white space.
Use Accent (Terracotta) sparingly for high-priority CTAs (e.g., 'Book Now').
Ensure text contrast ratios meet WCAG AA.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-semibold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-full px-6 py-4 font-medium
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-full px-6 py-4 font-medium

cards.style: bg-white border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 rounded-2xl p-6
cards.feature: bg-secondary/30 border-none hover:bg-secondary/50 transition-colors p-8 rounded-3xl

inputs.style: h-12 rounded-lg border-border focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary transition-all bg-white/50 backdrop-blur-sm

navigation.style: glassmorphism sticky top-0 z-50 border-b border-white/10 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-xl

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle grain or noise overlays on solid color backgrounds to add depth.

motion.loading: Use skeleton loaders with a shimmer effect.

images.description: Eiffel Tower beside Seine - Represents France endpoint.
Sidi Bou Said Blue Door - Represents Tunisia endpoint.
Cargo ship on blue ocean - Represents shipping.

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons. For specialized logistics icons, use Phosphor Icons if needed.

rules: Ensure all text has a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1.
Interactive elements must have a focus ring.
Use semantic HTML (main, section, article, nav).
All images must have alt text.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
